author: Jonathan Rutter
comment: Finally got it to work after unintelligible and install 3 times. I like it clean and neat. Good job.

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Takes some time to be transferred. Wait a bit please. Else contact me.

author: Rob van der Land
comment: 24:00 through 24:59 does not exist. After 23:59 its 0:00. Where can I change this or maybe it's a bug and you can change it in an update? It's utterly annoying if you're from the EU. Besides that, great app, just turn of sensors you don't use to save heaps off battery time

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Hmm that looks like a bug. I'll try to fix that. You can hold for settings and change to am/pm that should solve it for now.

author: 海洋
comment: How to apply this alike other app. I cant see any widget or something.  My device sw2.

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: This is a watchface, you need a smartwatch powered by Android. Feel free to send an email if you are having further trouble.

author: Kevin Newton
comment: Just download it today an I'm loving it doesn't use much battery at all this is just what I was looking for.
title: Love it!!!

author: Saurya Janbandhu
comment: Can't install on the watch from play store.. Btw I'm using a fossil q wander

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: You have to wait as sometimes it take a bit more time to be installed.

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Hi, it's for Android Wear. Are sure you have a watch? If yes it takes some time to transfer to the watch.

author: Nen Dav
comment: Well I don't see the app anywhere?

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Wait for it to install and hopefully you have a watch!

author: Vassilis Raptis
comment: Number one for me due to battery savings. No extra graphics and fully functional. Greta for outdoor activities

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: Thanks Vassili. Stay tuned for more updates

title: Great watch face

author: Sira van Zanten
comment: Great watch face. Love that you can see the altitude eg when hiking and uses lightweight memory imprint

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: thank you for the good words!

author: Thomas Milne
comment: All that empty space on top.  Would be nice for non all day calendar events information.

reply.author: Dimitrios Kanellopoulos
reply.content: You are right. Next step for this.
